sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnannvrsrymanage ( annvrsry_id , user_id , annvrsry_se , annvrsry_nm , annvrsry , cldr_se , annvrsry_ntcn_setup , annvrsry_ntcn_bgnde , memo , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , reptit_at ) VALUES ( #annvrsryId# , #userId# , #annvrsrySe# , #annvrsryNm# , #annvrsry# , #cldrSe# , #annvrsryNtcnSetup# , #annvrsryNtcnBgnde# , #memo# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE , #reptitAt# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnannvrsrymanage SET annvrsry_id = #annvrsryId# , user_id = #userId# , annvrsry_se = #annvrsrySe# , annvrsry_nm = #annvrsryNm# , annvrsry = #annvrsry# , cldr_se = #cldrSe# , annvrsry_ntcn_setup = #annvrsryNtcnSetup# , annvrsry_ntcn_bgnde = #annvrsryNtcnBgnde# , memo = #memo# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE , reptit_at = #reptitAt# WHERE 1 = 1 AND annvrsry_id = #annvrsryId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnannvrsrymanage WHERE 1 = 1 AND annvrsry_id = #annvrsryId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT annvrsry_id , user_id , annvrsry_se , annvrsry_nm , annvrsry , cldr_se , annvrsry_ntcn_setup , annvrsry_ntcn_bgnde , memo , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , reptit_at FROM COMTNANNVRSRYMANAGE WHERE annvrsry_id = #annvrsryId#

SELECT A.ANNVRSRY_ID , A.USER_ID , A.ANNVRSRY_SE , A.ANNVRSRY_NM , A.ANNVRSRY , A.CLDR_SE , A.ANNVRSRY_NTCN_SETUP , A.ANNVRSRY_NTCN_BGNDE , A.MEMO , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.REPTIT_AT FROM ( SELECT ANNVRSRY_ID , USER_ID , ANNVRSRY_SE , ANNVRSRY_NM , ANNVRSRY , CLDR_SE , ANNVRSRY_NTCN_SETUP , ANNVRSRY_NTCN_BGNDE , MEMO , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , REPTIT_AT , ROWNUM FROM COMTNANNVRSRYMANAGE WHERE 1=1
ANNVRSRY_ID = #searchKeyword#
USER_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY ANNVRSRY_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNANNVRSRYMANAGE WHERE 1=1
ANNVRSRY_ID = #searchKeyword#
USER_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
